entries.title: Razer's Blade 16 and 18 gaming laptops pack serious power – and hefty price tags
entries.description: Powered by the latest Nvidia graphics card, both Razer Blade laptops sport unique features like the 16's dual resolution display.

entries.title: This new Linux malware floods machines with cryptominers and DDoS bots
entries.description: Linux machines targeted with XMRig malware and being turned into DDoS bots.

entries.title: The Web3 industry lost billions to crypto fraud last year
entries.description: Turns out Web3 backers aren't great at spotting fraud attempts.

entries.title: Ring's Always Home Cam patrols your house while you're away
entries.description: As it follows a preset flight path, the drone will live stream in 1440p, but there are some restrictions.

entries.title: Lenovo’s new ThinkBook comes with modular accessories to boost your productivity
entries.description: Lenovo thinks it can appeal to more people by offering customizability in a new format, but will it work?

entries.title: VPNs are the #1 choice to browse the web anonymously, new data shows
entries.description: While the popularity of proxy servers and Tor browser is suffering, VPN services are on the rise everywhere.

entries.title: Louisiana requires digital government ID to access Pornhub and other adult sites
entries.description: Law HB 142 requires Louisianans to prove their age with a government ID to access adult sites like Pornhub – but does this compromise privacy?

entries.title: These were the worst ransomware attackers of 2022
entries.description: Ransomware groups are getting more sophisticated and destructive.

entries.title: AMD promises quick replacements for embarrassing GPU cooling fail
entries.description: AMD has pinpointed the cause of RX 7900 XTX overheating as the vapor chamber, but says ‘very few’ GPUs are affected.

entries.title: This divisive Microsoft Teams feature is coming to Zoom
entries.description: Human avatars arrive in Zoom, months after landing on Microsoft Teams.

entries.title: Google Maps just got a huge update for Wear OS smartwatches
entries.description: If you have an LTE Wear OS smartwatch with a data plan you'll be able to get Google Maps navigation without your smartphone.

entries.title: One of the best space games is now free on Epic Games store
entries.description: The latest couple of free games on the Epic Games store seem too good to be true.

entries.title: This smart telescope knows how to find stars and beat light pollution
entries.description: We get a demonstration at CES 2023 of Unistellar's new eQuinox 2, the smart telescope that finds the stars for you.

entries.title: This dangerous Android malware is seeing a huge rise in infections
entries.description: Its source code was published on GitHub, resulting in a spike in infections.

entries.title: Rackspace confirms customer data was hit in ransomware attack
entries.description: Dozens of Rackspace customers had their data accessed, but there's no evidence of it being abused yet.

entries.title: 7 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (January 6)
entries.description: From critically acclaimed thrillers to returning Star Wars series, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

entries.title: Tech workers were hit hard by layoffs in 2022
entries.description: Figures for US job cuts in 2022 are in, and tech workers were most affected. Is there good news?

entries.title: FiiO takes aim at Astell & Kern with new brutalist-build hi-res audio player
entries.description: This high-end portable music player boasts dual DACs while undercutting pricey rivals.

entries.title: This haptic shirt shocked me at CES and I'm not sure I hated it
entries.description: We test-drove OWO Haptic Gaming System at CES 2023 and felt sharp (and sometimes not particularly pleasant) stinging sensations.

entries.title: Hackers could exploit ChatGPT to attack networks
entries.description: Researchers asked ChatGPT how to hack a website, and it was happy to oblige.

entries.title: Eyes-on with Lumus Z-Lens, the mind-blowing future of AR glasses
entries.description: I've worn most every AR glasses under the sun. But nothing had really blown me away until I tried the Lumus Z-Lens.

entries.title: Tabs are coming to Notepad in future Windows 11 update - but what's next?
entries.description: Thanks to a leaked screenshot, tabs are coming to Notepad, but could this cheapen the simplicity of the app?

entries.title: Full fibre broadband rollout ramps up but adoption remains low
entries.description: More than 40% of UK homes can now access full-fibre broadband connections

entries.title: MegaCortex ransomware victims can now escape with a free decryptor
entries.description: Bitdefender makes tool freely available to decrypt data affected by MegaCortex ransomware attacks.

entries.title: Microsoft and AMD want to make Ryzen 7000 X3D CPUs run games faster in Windows 11
entries.description: The new design of the Ryzen 9 7900X3D and 7950X3D means there are complications for gaming.

entries.title: WhatsApp's latest update lets you message even through internet shutdowns and outages
entries.description: All WhatsApp users can now connect to free proxy servers to make sure your message gets through.

entries.title: The Razer Edge could be the perfect Game Pass streaming handheld
entries.description: With the Razer Edge’s release date being announced at CES 2023, it’s looking like this device could be ideal for Game Pass.

entries.title: Snap is closing its Zoom video filter tool
entries.description: Snap Camera cancelled following cutbacks, layoffs, and a change to the company’s revenue stream.

entries.title: Windows 11 figures are finally rising as businesses start to welcome upgrades
entries.description: After a fairly disastrous 2022 for Windows 11 adoption, large enterprises are starting to take things seriously.

entries.title: Wednesday season 2 is inevitable – and this cryptic Netflix teaser proves it
entries.description: A curious Netflix video teaser all but confirms Wednesday season 2 is on the way.

entries.title: Leaked Samsung Galaxy S23 renders show an uninspiring selection of colors
entries.description: A leaker has revealed what they claim are the four colors you'll be able to get the Samsung Galaxy S23 series in.

entries.title: Microsoft Excel is fixing one of its most frustrating faults at last
entries.description: Take the pain out of dull, repetitive Microsoft Excel tasks with new Office Scripts.

entries.title: The Last of Us creator Neil Druckmann explains the HBO show’s timeline change
entries.description: The Last of Us’ creator explains why the HBO series is set in present-day America.

entries.title: Apple’s AI audiobooks are a long way from killing off human narrators
entries.description: Apple has launched a new audiobook series that's narrated by AI – but their robotic tones won't kill off human narrators for a while yet.

entries.title: LG Display's go-anywhere paper-thin speakers could be the future of audio
entries.description: LG Display Automotive's super-thin actuators can turn almost anything into a speaker.

entries.title: CES's best screen may be less than an inch wide
entries.description: LG Display has built what may be the first 0.42-inch, 1024x768 OLEDoS display
